widget.convert: sKIn Entwickler kannst du gerne Untersttzen mit einen Amazongutschein oder per PayPal an: mike-andesson@web.de Senden! Danke im Voraus

screen.title: Subtitle settings
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize wsizex = 1920 wsizey = 1080 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 120, textsize[1] + 120) offset = 45 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 105 wsizex = textsize[0] + 180 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (1200 > wsizex): wsizex = 1200 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 96) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxConfirmCode
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 90 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex = 800 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 80) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] # self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: DialogScreen
screen.title: DialogScreen
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 90 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 80) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, (720-wsizey)/2))
